namespace blobfolio\phone\data;

class dataGI extends data {

	const CODE = 'GI';

	const PREFIX = 350;

	const REGION = 'Europe';

	const PATTERNS = array(
		'(?:[25]\d\d|629)\d{5}',
	);

	const TYPES = array(
		'2(?:(?:00\d|2(?:2[2457]|50))\d|1(?:6[24-7]\d|90[0-2]))\d{3}'=>array(
			'fixed',
		),
		'(?:5[46-8]\d|629)\d{5}'=>array(
			'mobile',
		),
	);

	const FORMATS = array(
		'(\d{3})(\d{5})'=>'$1 $2',
	);

}
